project_descr: Mainstreaming Disaster Risk Management in Sub-national Development and Land Use/Physical Framework Planning in the Philippines

outputs.output_descr: The major outputs are (a) guidelines and training materials for the preparation of DRM components of subnational/local plans (b) training/workshop sessions (c) subnational and local DRM components iof the regional, local and municipal physical / land use plans and implementation of small-scale mitigation measures.

project_title: mainstreaming drm in sub-national development and land u
